name: E-Seal 1002
description: E-Seal 1002 is a two component, high performance corrosion resistant polymer sealer that provides over 300 hours of salt spray protection to white rust and 500 hours of salt spray protection to red rust when applied over zinc plated (zinc plating thickness 0.0003") parts in E-Brite Ultra Alk or E-Brite Ultra Chlor plating baths and chromated in E-Chrome hexavalent or E-PASSivate trivalent chromates. E-Seal 1002-A and E-Seal 1002-B are concentrated liquids that are diluted to 10-40% by volume with tap water.
